title: Berso
description: Berso is a platform built for Ethiopia, similar to Yelp, designed to help users discover and rate local businesses. The app integrates Google Maps API to easily search for businesses, rate them, and help small businesses gain visibility. It serves as a review and recommendations platform to enhance the discoverability of small businesses across the region.

title: Zewd Management System
description: A role-based dashboard created for employees at Zewd to manage student and employee information. It includes user authentication, CRUD operations for both student and employee records, an attendance module, and student report module

title: Merit Learning Management System
description: A Learning Management System (LMS) that includes user management, authentication, course management, and payment integration via Chapa. The project also utilizes Cloudinary for image and media storage.
